title: ShapeStyle
description: Schema of all properties of a ShapeStyle.

backgroundColor.description: The background color for this wireframe as a String hexadecimal. Follows the #RRGGBBAA color format with the alpha value as optional. The default value should be #FFFFFF00.

opacity.description: The opacity of this wireframe. Takes values from 0 to 1, default value should be 1.

cornerRadius.description: The corner(border) radius of this wireframe in pixels. The default value should be 0.
